title: accessibility issues with owncloud web interface
body:
hi,

the web interface of owncloud is not really accessible for blind users. i'm a blind user of owncloud and i cant for example not access the settings menu as an owncloud admin with my screenreader program. also it is not possible to access the settings if i'm logged in as a normal user. it does not matter if i'm using windows or mac, my screenreader programms do have big problems with the owncloud web interface and a few things, that worked in earlier versions, do not longer work in owncloud 5.0.9.

i think it would be cool to improve the useablity of owncloud also for blind users and if you are also interested in this i'd be glad to help. in my opinion not many things have to be changed, it has only to be make sure, that all buttons and elements of the interface can be reached by keyboard, buttons can be submitted by keyboard, etc.

please let me know, if i can help you with making the interface more accessible.
